about_the_game:
MMD Engine enables you to add customizable character touch interaction capabilities on your MMD models , including voice emotion and animtion for custom interactions. Support STEAM Workshop.

Features

  • Support import MMD models in PMX format directly
  • Support Anime 2D rendering
  • Support Multi-Outfits
  • Support customize different touch parts to make different reactions
  • Support custom voice ,emotion and motion of interaction
  • Support STEAM Workshop
  • Support Multi-language
  • Lightweight rendering engine, lower resource usage
  • Compatible with all other software and live wallpapers

name: MMD Engine

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 11 / 10 / 8.1 / 8 / 7
  • Processor: Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 4000 or above
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10,11 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, AMD HD7870, 2 GB VRAM or above
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
